item.title: Cleeve View Road - Speed Bumps, 25th August
item.description:
Request for traffic calming measures, speed bumps and/or lowering of speed limit to 20mph on Cleeve View Road. Vehicles frequently drive down the road at excessive speed. Since parking is on both sides of the street, excessive speed presents a significant risk to pedestrians crossing the street, and to other road users.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Cleeve View Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 25th August
item.description:
The drain is blocked, it is at least a spades depth of soil as we have tried to rectify the issue ourselves.this was reported in April and nothing has been done about it, access should not be an issue as it is at the edge of a marked out disabled space. The drain is outside number 25/27 Alexandra Street. Rain will not drain and we are due heavy downfall after a period of drought so this is a concern.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Alexandra Street, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flags attached to street lights, making me feel unsafe, 25th August
item.description:
Flags have been attached overnight to several street lights in the Central reservation of Tewkesbury road, by the garage and Lidl. I am white British, but I find this display not only breaks the law, but is also intimidating as a symbol if the far right. There must be cctv footage available to prosecute the offenders.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
